title: How to Create an Xbox Live Gamertag

steps.headline: Create an account with MSN (go to www.msn.com, click "sign in" then click "sign up".)
Go to www.xbox.com and click register.
Enter your information, pick a name, avatar, etc.
If you just want a silver membership, you're done.
steps.description: If you want to be able to play games online, keep reading.

steps.headline: Enter your Credit Card number or promotional code.
Wait for a PM on the forums, once you get it click the validate link.

text: Create an account with MSN (go to www.msn.com, click "sign in" then click "sign up".)  Wait for the confirmation e-mail. (This can take up to 10 min) Go to www.xbox.com and click register.  Enter your information, pick a name, avatar, etc.  Enter your MSN registered address.  If you just want a silver membership, you're done. If you want to be able to play games online, keep reading. Click next, and then upgrade.  Enter your Credit Card number or promotional code.  Wait for another confirmation e-mail. (This will only take 1-2 min) Wait for a PM on the forums, once you get it click the validate link.  Congratulations, you're finally done.
